method.name: setAllPoiParkTextColor
method.comment: Sets color for all resturant park labels. color: color to be applied for the label

method.name: setAllPoiTextColor
method.comment: Sets color for all resturant labels. color: color to be applied for the label

method.name: setAllRoadHighwayStrokeColor
method.comment: Sets stroke color for all highway roads. color: color to be applied for the stoke

method.name: setAllRoadTextColor
method.comment: Sets label color for all roads. color: color to be applied for the label

method.name: setAllRoadLocalStrokeColor
method.comment: Sets stroke color for all local roads. color: color to be applied for the stroke

method.name: setAllTransitStationTextColor
method.comment: Sets label color for all transit stations. color: color to be applied for the label

method.name: setCustomFeatureLightness
method.comment: Sets custom feature lightness to be applied for more details visit https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/style-reference featureType: type of feature to be added elementType: element in which property to be applied lightness: color to be applied

method.name: setAllRoadHighwayBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets color for all highway roads. color: color to be applied

method.name: setAllRoadLocalBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets color for all local roads. color: color to be applied

method.name: setAllTransitBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets color for all transits. color: color to be applied

method.name: setAllRoadArterialStrokeColor
method.comment: Sets stroke color for all arterial roads.arterial means important route in a system of roads, railway lines, or rivers. color: color to be applied for the stroke

method.name: setAllMainTownTextColor
method.comment: Sets color for all main city labels. color: color to be applied for the label

method.name: setAllWaterTextColor
method.comment: Sets color for labels in water. color: color to be applied for the label

method.name: setAllWaterTextStrokeAlpha
method.comment: Sets stroke alpha for labels in water. lightness: alpha to be applied,use -ve values for lesser alpha and +ve values for increased alpha

method.name: setMainGeometryColor
method.comment: Sets background color for all the continentals color: background color to be applied

method.name: setAllPlaceTextStrokeAlpha
method.comment: Sets text stroke to all place labels lightness: alpha to be applied,use -ve values for lesser alpha and +ve values for increased alpha

method.name: setAllWaterBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets color for water. color: color to be applied

method.name: setAllRoadHighwayTextColor
method.comment: Sets color for labels in all highway roads. color: color to be applied for the label

method.name: setAllRoadArterialBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets color for all arterial roads.arterial means important route in a system of roads, railway lines, or rivers. color: color to be applied

method.name: setCustomFeatureColor
method.comment: Sets custom feature color to be applied for more details visit https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/style-reference featureType: type of feature to be added elementType: element in which property to be applied color: color to be applied

method.name: setAllPlaceTextColor
method.comment: Sets color for all the place texts excluding water label text,main city text etc. color: color to be applied for the label

method.name: setAllRoadBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets color for all roads. color: color to be applied for the road

method.name: build
method.comment:
Call this method to build the GoogleMapStyler and to apply it to the given GoogleMap.
Call this only after you set all Colors like you wish as it applies the setting to GoogleMap

method.name: setAllPoiParkBackgroundColor
method.comment: Sets background color for all resturant parks. color: color to be applied for resturant parks
